skills.name: SALTED WOUND
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Inflict Perfect Heal Block on the enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: NUMB SKULL
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Remove All Immunity effects, including Vanish and Perfect Immunity from the target.
• Inflict Stun on the target and self for 2 turns.
